response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Array Sum\", \"description\": \"Given an array of integers, calculate the sum of all elements. Write a function `array_sum` that takes an array of integers as input and returns the sum.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef array_sum(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integer values.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the sum of all elements in the input array.\\n\", \"code\": \"def array_sum(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n    return sum(arr)\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert array_sum([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]) == 15\", \"assert array_sum([-10, 0, 10]) == 0\", \"assert array_sum([]) == 0\"] }"
